abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes defacing of statues of saints in shrine room at St Anthony-St Alphonsus Catholic Church in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, by church visitors; supplicants have for decades been writing their names on figures in belief that act will increase power of their prayers.
lead_paragraph: There is a stubborn and mysterious problem in the shrine room of a Brooklyn church: The many statues are defaced with the names of visitors seeking intercession.

headline.main: Furtive Pleas to the Saints, Scribbled on Their Statues
headline.print_headline: Furtive Pleas to the Saints Are Scribbled on Their Statues

snippet: There is a stubborn and mysterious problem in the shrine room of a Brooklyn church: The many statues are defaced with the names of visitors seeking intercession.
